title: Why are some champions more expensive then others?
body:
So I just started playing lol and I really enjoy the game but Im just wondering why are some champions more expensive then others?
Is it just the fact that they are stronger than others?
OR 
They just look more BA

replies.body:
The price points for champions are largely based on how old that particular champion is. For instance, most of the champions that the game started with are now reduced to 450 IP/260 RP. 

You can check out the other details on champion prices on our article about [**Price Reductions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction).
